entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is concerned about the hidden passageway and Ron's celebrity status.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who has become an instant celebrity after the night's events. He is happy to tell anyone what happened, with a wealth of detail.

entities.name: honeyduke's
entities.description: A shop in Hogsmeade village that has not been broken into, according to Ron.

entities.name: hogsemeade
entities.description: A village where Harry and Ron live. The one-eyed witch's shop is boarded up, which would prevent Harry from going there again.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about the hidden passageway and Ron's celebrity status. He asks Ron if they should tell someone about it.
If the one-eyed witch's shop is boarded up, Harry would never be able to go into Hogsmeade again.
According to Ron, Honeyduke's shop has not been broken into.
